body:
- [**closed**] authorisation issue [#6244](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6244)
- [**closed**] Apicurio-registry RBAC integration with Keycloak [#6243](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6243)
- [**closed**] Update NPM packages in Apicurio UI to fix critical vulnerabilities [#6239](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6239)
- [**type/question**] Keycloak Integration with Apicurio-registry [#6232](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6232)
- [**closed**] Apicurio Schema Registry 3.0.7 - unable to update multiple versions of schema for artifactId [#6188](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6188)
- [**closed**] how to migrate data from schema-registry to apicurio? [#6152](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6152)
- [**closed**] Security issues found in 3.0.6 [#6119](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6119)
- [**type/enhancement**][**priority/normal**][**version/3.x**][**port/3.x-to-2.x**][**version/2.6.x**][**area/operator**] Operator should have a way to provide an IngressClass reference to the Ingresses [#5826](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/5826)
- [**type/bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/ui**] Cannot deep link into the application - post-login redirects back to the Explore page [#4948](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/4948)
- [**type/bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**][**area/serdes**] Schema Registry: ProtobufKafkaSerializer.validate fails if map<string, string> is used in the Protobuf file [#3161](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3161)
- [**type/bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] protobuf 3 forward compatibility [#2548](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2548)
- [**type/enhancement**][**impacts/documentation**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Avro Converter - Basic authentication not supported in URL [#2184](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2184)
- [**type/enhancement**][**type/question**] Delete the last version of a schema [#2016](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2016)
